title: Can't connect to games
body:
Whenever i try to connect to games, i never even get to loading screen before it sends me to the reconnect screen. This isn't on my end as thousands of others have it too. My friendslist and everything works perfectly fine. All other games works fine, i have a stable connection, have tried restting my router, everything.

also to note, this happening without me changing anything at all.

replies.body: Friends list and other areas of the client access different servers, and in your specific issue it seems your network is blocked from reaching the game server.  League is always online so connection issues can be pretty common.  You'll want to go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot, though, test it in a custom first.
I have now tried everything in the post you linked, and the problem still occurs.

Aw sorry to hear.  In this case, grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to collect some logs and attach it to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can work with you directly on this.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
